translation: The eye faculty, the ear faculty, the nose faculty, the tongue faculty, the body faculty, the mind faculty, the female faculty, the male faculty, the life faculty, the pleasure faculty, the pain faculty, the joy faculty, the grief faculty, the equanimity faculty, the faith faculty
